name: Pro1ConnectWIFIThermostat
0:
”Alexa, set Bedroom to 70 degrees.”
”Alexa, what is Kitchen thermostat set to?”
”Alexa, set My thermostat to cool mode.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Pro1 Connect WIFI Thermostat skill, you can use Alexa to check or set your thermostat with Alexa voice controls. This skill links to your user account in the Pro1 Connect app, available for download on mobile devices through both Apple App Store and Google Play Store. Once your Pro1 Connect and Amazon Alexa accounts are linked, you can:
* View and set your Pro1 WIFI thermostat temperature in the Alexa app
* Add your Pro1 WIFI thermostats to Alexa Device Groups

You can connect your Pro1 WIFI thermostats to Alexa in one of 2 ways:
* Click "Enable to use" in the Amazon Alexa app, then enter your Pro1 Connect username and password when prompted.
* In the Pro1 Connect app, in the main menu, select "Smart Home", then click the button for "Amazon Alexa" and follow the instructions shown.

For video tutorials demonstrating how to connect your account and control your devices from Alexa, please see <https://pro1iaq.com/products/wifi-thermostat/wifi-help>.
For additional support, contact our customer support team at: customerservice@pro1iaq.com
